text: David Heilbroner is an American director, producer and sound editor. Best known for producing Traffic Stop (2017) for which he received Academy Award for Best Documentary Short Subject nomination with wife Kate Davis at the 90th Academy Awards. ==Filmography== * 2018: Say Her Name: The Life and Death of Sandra Bland (Documentary) * 2017: Traffic Stop (Documentary short) * 2014: The Newburgh Sting (Documentary) * 2013: The Cheshire Murders (TV Movie documentary) * 2011: American Experience (TV Series documentary) * 2010: Stonewall Uprising (Documentary) * 2009: Waiting for Armageddon (Documentary) * 2006: Plastic Disasters (TV Movie documentary) * 2006: Ten Days That Unexpectedly Changed America' (TV Series documentary) * 2005: Pucker Up (Documentary) * 2004: Jockey (Documentary) * 2000: American Babylon (Documentary) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1950s births Category:American film producers Category:American film directors
title: David Heilbroner
